extent: the CEOS and execs of companies such as Fred Smith of FEDEX, Norman Waitt Of Gateway, Jeff Skoll of Ebay, Roger Marino of EMC, Marc Turtletaub of The Money Store, Marc Cuban/Todd Wagner, and others

mentionArg1.extent: the CEOS and execs of companies such as Fred Smith of FEDEX, Norman Waitt Of Gateway, Jeff Skoll of Ebay, Roger Marino of EMC, Marc Turtletaub of The Money Store, Marc Cuban/Todd Wagner, and others

Sentence: the CEOS and execs of companies such as Fred Smith of FEDEX , Norman Waitt Of Gateway , Jeff Skoll of Ebay , Roger Marino of EMC , Marc Turtletaub of The Money Store , Marc Cuban / Todd Wagner , and others have all parked their money in film ventures and deals similar to ours , I need a similar self made entrepreneur who recently sold his company ; is currently at the helm of one ; or , a recently exited executive with a large severance pay who is sitting in the middle of nowhere , USA , is bored , and has always secretly wanted to get into the film business for tax , vanity , or alternative investment reasons .
